Dataset info:

1. academic
	protected attribute: "gender=F"
	source: https://www.kaggle.com/aljarah/xAPI-Edu-Data

2. bank
	protected attribute: "martial=divorced"
	source:https://www.kaggle.com/janiobachmann/bank-marketing-dataset#bank.csv

3. german credit
	protected attributes: "gender=female"
	source:https://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/datasets/statlog+(german+credit+data)

4. adult
	protected attributes: "sex= Female" (note there is a empty space)
	source:https://www.kaggle.com/wenruliu/adult-income-dataset#adult.csv
